tips.li: Beware of supply and demand. Flooding the market with a resource will decrease its value, and buying up the planet's stock of a resource will hike its price.
The global markets will stabilize given several years, but prices may drift drastically.
Keep an eye on the news. Global events might effect the markets drastically and complicate your investments.
Low on silver? Take out a loan from a bank of your choosing at a trading terminal.
